mapper.sql: id, principal_id, pre_status, status, opinion, created_user, created_date
mapper.update: update bic_audit_log set principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_status = #{preStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
